name: Pork spring roll
description: Crispy spring rolls filled with pork and depp-fried to golden perfection

name: Shrimp spring roll
description: Crispy spring rolls filled with shrimp and depp-fried to golden perfection

name: Vegetable spring roll
description: Crispy spring rolls filled with vegetables and depp-fried to golden perfection

name: Rice paper rolls
description: Traditional and healthy Vietnamese fresh rolls, filled with herbs, choice of protein, and crisp veggies, served with Peanut sauce.

name: Beef kebab
description: Savory Vietnamese beef kebab, where tender marinated beef and colorful bell peppers come together on a skewer, grilled to perfection and served with a side of sweet Thai chilli sauce.

name: Pho noodle
description: Pho, a comforting bowl of traditional Vietnamese beef broth, rice noodles, choice of meat or veggies, and a refreshing touch of fresh herbs and lime.

name: Chicken broth noodle
description: A comforting bowl of chick broth, choice of noodles and protein, and a refreshing touch of fresh herbs and lime.

name: Grill meat vermicelli
description: Vietnamese bun thit nuong, choice of grilled lemongrass protein, vermicelli noodles, fresh veggies, crush peanut and a delightful fish sauce dressing

name: Spring roll vermicelli
description: Vietnamese bun thit nuong, choice of deep fried spring rolls, vermicelli noodles, fresh veggies, crush peanut and a delightful fish sauce dressing

name: Grilled pork chop with steamed rice
description: Marinated grilled pork chop, served over a bed of steaming rice, complemented by our special house-made fish sauce

name: Grilled pork chop, shredded pork skin, and egg quiche with steamed rice
description: Marinated grilled pork chop, shredded pork skin, adn a slice of pork loaf topped with egg yolk, served over a bed of steaming rice, complemented by our special house-made fish sauce

name: Pad Thai
description: A flavorful Thai noodle dish with stir-fried rice noodles, choice of protein or mixed vegetables, bean sprouts, eggs, and a delicious blend of sweet and savory sauces, topped with crushed peanuts

name: Crunchy egg noodles
description: Crispy egg noodles are topped with a choice of juicy protein, and a delicious blend of brightly colored vegetables

name: Three color beans
description: A refreshing Vietnamese dessert of ice slush, contrast of mung beans paste, soft red beans and bouncy jelly bites, topped with layers of rich coconut sauce

name: Deep fried banana with ice cream
description: Deep fried bananas served with 2 scoops of ice cream, drizzled with chocolate sauce
